name: Andrélon Special conditioner mild en zacht
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cocos Nucifera Fruit Extract (Kokosmelk), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Parfum, Behentrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Magnesium Nitrate, Sine Adipe Lac, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Coumarin, Linalool.
